text: Scarlet Sails () is a 1961 Soviet fantasy drama movie directed by Alexandr Ptushko.Капитан Грей, офицер Варавва: каким мы запомним Василия ЛановогоАЛЫЕ ПАРУСА It stars Anastasiya Vertinskaya, Vasily Lanovoy, and Yelena "Lena" Cheremshanova. ==Actors== * Anastasiya Vertinskaya as Assol * Vasily Lanovoy as Arthur Grey * Yelena "Lena" Cheremshanova as Young Assol * Aleksandr "Sasha" Lupenko as Young Arthur * Ivan Pereverzev as Longren == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:1961 fantasy movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksandr Ptushko
title: Scarlet Sails (movie)
